title: Google\Cloud\Bigtable\Admin\V2\CreateTableFromSnapshotRequest
name: CreateTableFromSnapshotRequest
description:
Request message for [google.bigtable.admin.v2.BigtableTableAdmin.CreateTableFromSnapshot][google.bigtable.admin.v2.BigtableTableAdmin.CreateTableFromSnapshot] Note: This is a private alpha release of Cloud Bigtable snapshots. This feature is not currently available to most Cloud Bigtable customers. This feature might be changed in backward-incompatible ways and is not recommended for production use. It is not subject to any SLA or deprecation policy.

Generated from protobuf message google.bigtable.admin.v2.CreateTableFromSnapshotRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.parent
params.description: Required. The unique name of the instance in which to create the table. Values are of the form projects/{project}/instances/{instance}.

params.name: data.table_id
params.description: Required. The name by which the new table should be referred to within the parent instance, e.g., foobar rather than {parent}/tables/foobar.

params.name: data.source_snapshot
params.description: Required. The unique name of the snapshot from which to restore the table. The snapshot and the table must be in the same instance. Values are of the form projects/{project}/instances/{instance}/clusters/{cluster}/snapshots/{snapshot}.

methods.name: getParent
methods.description:
Required. The unique name of the instance in which to create the table.

Values are of the form projects/{project}/instances/{instance}.
